document.full_text: the fed will break a tradition on wednesday and  hold a news conference after the regular meeting of the policy-making committee. what question would you ask the fed chairman?
document.title: do you have a question for mr. bernanke?
lines_and_colors: the fed will break a tradition on wednesday and  hold a news conference after the regular meeting of the policy-making committee. what question would you ask the fed chairman?
